# Replication Problems

Data replication and consistency patterns.

## Problems

| ID | Name | Description |
|----|------|-------------|
| rp001 | Primary-Backup | Primary-backup replication |
| rp002 | Chain Replication | Chain replication |
| rp003 | Quorum Read | Quorum read |
| rp004 | Quorum Write | Quorum write |
| rp005 | Anti-Entropy | Anti-entropy repair |
| rp006 | Gossip | Gossip protocol |
| rp007 | Vector Clock | Vector timestamps |
| rp008 | Version Vector | Version vectors |
| rp009 | Read Repair | Read repair |
